Package org.team21.game.controllers

Class MapEditorController

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.controllers.MapEditorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameFlowManager, MapEditor
public class MapEditorController extends Object implements MapEditor, GameFlowManager
This class is used to create map through different commands for different operations.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Bharti Chhabra
